Sentencas: A dual surface modification of an SOFC metallic interconnect with a Gd2O3 layer and an MnCo2O4 coating was evaluated.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: The tested samples were oxidized for 7000 h in air at 1073 K. Oxidation products were characterized using XRD, SEM-EDS, and confocal Raman imaging, and ASR was measured.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: The effect of gadolinium segregation at grain boundaries in Cr2O3 was evaluated using S/TEM-EDS.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: Area specific-resistance was measured and fuel cell tests investigating electrochemical performance and Cr contamination of electrodes were also performed.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: The results show that the proposed dual modification was more advantageous than either modification applied separately.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: The fuel cell tests performed after aging in humidified hydrogen at 1073 K and involving an actual interconnect made of this dual-modified material showed that after 250 h of aging its electrochemical parameters were nearly identical to those of the non-aged reference electrode.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices

Sentencas: Moreover, the modification protected the electrodes from Cr poisoning.
Titulo: Effectiveness of a dual surface modification of metallic interconnects for application in energy conversion devices
